name: @pojntfx/task-timer
description: A simple app to calculate the amount of time tasks will take

scripts.build: parcel build src/pages/index.html -d assets-dist && chmod +x src/cmd/* && pkg . -t node10-linux-x64 --output dist/app-amd64 && wget https://github.com/robertsLando/pkg-binaries/blob/master/arm64/fetched-v10.15.3-linux-arm64?raw=true -O ~/.pkg-cache/v2.6/fetched-v10.15.3-linux-arm64 && pkg . -t node10-linux-arm64 --output dist/app-arm64

author: Felicitas Pojtinger <felicitas@pojtinger.com>
